name: Malaeb Limited
description: Developer of a mobile application platform designed to search and book football fields around Bahrain. The company's application helps to edit the bookings and keep the booking process in real-time, create teams, challenge other users and join a football match and permits each user to have a profile with activities and reviews, enabling football players to book pitches close to location conveniently and time-efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application platform designed to search and book football fields around Bahrain. The company's application helps to edit the bookings and keep the booking process in real-time, create teams, challenge other users and join a football match and permits each user to have a profile with activities and reviews, enabling football players to book pitches close to location conveniently and time-efficiently.
